dcterms:description: The Tanks and Temples dataset is used to evaluate methods for large-scale scene reconstruction, featuring outdoor scenes with significant light reflections, containing approximately 300 images per scene.
dcterms:title: Tanks and Temples

dcterms:description: The Mixed Sampling dataset was created by the authors to better match real shooting habits, capturing images using various methods including drone and mobile phone, resulting in 200 to 300 images per dataset.
dcterms:title: Mixed Sampling

dcterms:creator: Jonathan T Barron
Ben Mildenhall
Nima Khademi Kalantari
Pratul P. Srinivasan
Ravi Ramamoorthi
Ren Ng
dcterms:description: The Garden Dataset is included in the evaluation of the Enhance-NeRF method, providing a multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields.
dcterms:title: Garden Dataset

dcterms:creator: Matthew Tancik
Richard Li
Angjoo Kanazawa
dcterms:description: The Poster Dataset is utilized in the Enhance-NeRF method, serving as a modular framework for neural radiance field development.
dcterms:title: Poster Dataset
